meanings.definition: transfecting: to introduce foreign DNA into a cell
meanings.sent1: Scientists are transfecting cells in the lab to study genetic changes.
meanings.sent2: She is transfecting the cells with new DNA for the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The cells were surprised when the scientists started transfecting them with new genes.
meanings.sent4: Transfecting the cells is like giving them a tiny genetic makeover.
meanings.sent5: The process of transfecting can revolutionize genetic research.

meanings.definition: transfecting: the process of introducing foreign genetic material into a cell
meanings.sent1: The transfecting of DNA into the cell was successful.
meanings.sent2: We observed the transfecting of genetic material under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The transfecting of genes into the cell seemed like a tiny genetic party.
meanings.sent4: The transfecting of new DNA was a key step in the experiment.
meanings.sent5: Witnessing the transfecting process was fascinating.
